meanings.sent1: The superstratum of the cake was decorated with colorful sprinkles.
meanings.sent2: The superstratum of the building housed the executive offices.
meanings.sent3: The superstratum of whipped cream on the dessert made it look like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a bright superstratum of happiness on her face.
meanings.sent5: The golden superstratum of sunlight bathed the room in a warm glow.

meanings.definition: A layer of rock or soil overlying another.
meanings.sent1: The archaeologists carefully removed the superstratum of soil to uncover ancient artifacts.
meanings.sent2: The superstratum of sedimentary rock showed distinct fossil imprints.
meanings.sent3: The superstratum of snow on the mountain glistened in the sunlight like a blanket of diamonds.
meanings.sent4: The superstratum of dust on the old bookshelves hinted at years of neglect.
meanings.sent5: The superstratum of fallen leaves in the forest crunched underfoot as they walked.
